entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Nelson Airport 1:00 PM MST Saturday 10 September 2016

Temperature: 5.9°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 5 except near plus 1 over higher terrain.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wet snow near the Rockies. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 5 except near plus 1 over higher terrain. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Wet snow near the Rockies this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 10 September 2016
